root.name: Cro Mag Rally
root.description: OverviewCro-Mag Rally is a third-person racing/arcade game made by Pangea Software. The game centers around two cavemen racers, Brog and Grag in cars made out of materials associated with cavemen, as they race through different stages of ancient history. In single player mode, one player races against five computer controlled racers, through each of the levels, and gains new cars and weapons along the way. In two player mode, two players can race against each other in any level with any vehicle, or play other games, such as tag, capture the flag or survival.After Being Adapted for iPhone and iPod Touch, gameplay was featured in a commercial for the App Store.On January 7th, 2012 Cro-Mag Rally was released on Xbox Live Indie Games for the price of 240 Microsoft Points (or $3).
